titleInfo.title: WAS brought to the City Police Jail.

mods.abstract: WAS brought to the City Police Jail on the 15th of February, 1861, the dark griff boy FRED, alias WILLIAMSays he belongs to MrThomas Smith, who lives in Mobile, AlabamaHe is 5 feet 4 1/2 inches high, has fine teeth, is beardless, looks rather intelligent, and is aged about 24 yearsThe owner will call and claim his property according to lawMIGUEL HERNANDEZ, JR., Keeper of City Police JailRegistered February 18, 1861F.JFORSTALL, Deputy Comptrollerfe19 15t

detail.title: New Orleans daily crescent([New Orleans, La.]) 1851-1866

mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

Physical rights are retained by the LSU LibrariesCopyright has expired and the item is therefore in the public domainPermission to reproduce this image must be requested through the Special Collections Department, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
